justification: The data clump identified by key 58 affects multiple files, specifically 'src/argouml-core-diagrams-sequence2/src/org/argouml/sequence2/diagram/FigLifeLine.java' and 'src/argouml-core-diagrams-activity2/src/org/argouml/activity2/diagram/FigBaseNode.java', indicating that the same set of parameters (x, y, w, h) are being used in methods across these different classes. This repetition suggests that a refactoring could reduce the duplication and potentially simplify method signatures and usages across these files.
